channel.title: üè¢ Tsinghua University on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Tsinghua University on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: EpiCoder: Encompassing Diversity and Complexity in Code Generation
item.description: EpiCoder revolutionizes code generation by using feature trees to create diverse and complex training data, resulting in state-of-the-art performance on various benchmarks.

item.title: URSA: Understanding and Verifying Chain-of-thought Reasoning in Multimodal Mathematics
item.description: URSA-7B: A new multimodal model significantly improves chain-of-thought reasoning in mathematics!

item.title: MotionBench: Benchmarking and Improving Fine-grained Video Motion Understanding for Vision Language Models
item.description: MotionBench, a new benchmark, reveals that existing video models struggle with fine-grained motion understanding. To address this, the authors propose TE Fusion, a novel architecture that improves mo…

item.title: Dynamic Scaling of Unit Tests for Code Reward Modeling
item.description: Boosting code generation accuracy with more unit tests! This research shows that increasing the number of unit tests used to evaluate code generated by LLMs significantly improves accuracy, especially…

item.title: HumanEval Pro and MBPP Pro: Evaluating Large Language Models on Self-invoking Code Generation
item.description: New benchmarks, HumanEval Pro and MBPP Pro, reveal LLMs struggle with self-invoking code generation, highlighting a critical gap in current code reasoning capabilities.

item.title: VisionReward: Fine-Grained Multi-Dimensional Human Preference Learning for Image and Video Generation
item.description: VisionReward, a novel reward model, surpasses existing methods by precisely capturing multi-dimensional human preferences for image and video generation, enabling more accurate and stable model optimi…

item.title: Fourier Position Embedding: Enhancing Attention's Periodic Extension for Length Generalization
item.description: FoPE enhances attention’s periodic extension for better length generalization in language models by addressing spectral damage in RoPE using Fourier Series and zeroing out destructive frequencies.

item.title: Distilled Decoding 1: One-step Sampling of Image Auto-regressive Models with Flow Matching
item.description: Distilled Decoding (DD) drastically speeds up image generation from autoregressive models by using flow matching to enable one-step sampling, achieving significant speedups while maintaining acceptabl…

item.title: How to Synthesize Text Data without Model Collapse?
item.description: Token-level editing prevents language model collapse from synthetic data by theoretically bounding test error and empirically improving model performance.

item.title: ReMoE: Fully Differentiable Mixture-of-Experts with ReLU Routing
item.description: ReMoE: Revolutionizing Mixture-of-Experts with fully differentiable ReLU routing, achieving superior scalability and performance.

item.title: LLaVA-UHD v2: an MLLM Integrating High-Resolution Feature Pyramid via Hierarchical Window Transformer
item.description: LLaVA-UHD v2 enhances MLLMs by integrating high-resolution visual details using a hierarchical window transformer.

item.title: ColorFlow: Retrieval-Augmented Image Sequence Colorization
item.description: ColorFlow, a new AI model, accurately colorizes black-and-white image sequences while preserving character identity.

item.title: SPaR: Self-Play with Tree-Search Refinement to Improve Instruction-Following in Large Language Models
item.description: Self-play method SPAR enhances LLMs instruction following abilities, beating GPT-4 on IFEval

item.title: SynerGen-VL: Towards Synergistic Image Understanding and Generation with Vision Experts and Token Folding
item.description: SynerGen-VL: A simpler, more powerful unified MLLM for image understanding and generation.

item.title: Expanding Performance Boundaries of Open-Source Multimodal Models with Model, Data, and Test-Time Scaling
item.description: InternVL 2.5, a new open-source multimodal LLM, surpasses 70% on the MMMU benchmark, rivaling top commercial models through model, data, and test-time scaling strategies.

item.title: Densing Law of LLMs
item.description: LLMs’ training quality is exponentially improving, enabling models with half the parameters to match state-of-the-art performance every 3 months, thus reducing inference costs.

item.title: GenMAC: Compositional Text-to-Video Generation with Multi-Agent Collaboration
item.description: GENMAC: Multi-agent collaboration revolutionizes compositional text-to-video generation, achieving state-of-the-art results by iteratively refining videos via specialized agents.

item.title: 2DGS-Room: Seed-Guided 2D Gaussian Splatting with Geometric Constrains for High-Fidelity Indoor Scene Reconstruction
item.description: 2DGS-Room: Seed-guided 2D Gaussian splatting with geometric constraints achieves state-of-the-art high-fidelity indoor scene reconstruction.

item.title: MIDI: Multi-Instance Diffusion for Single Image to 3D Scene Generation
item.description: MIDI: a novel multi-instance diffusion model generates compositional 3D scenes from single images by simultaneously creating multiple 3D instances with accurate spatial relationships and high generali…

item.title: Free Process Rewards without Process Labels
item.description: Train high-performing Process Reward Models (PRMs) cheaply using only outcome-level labels, eliminating the need for costly step-by-step annotations!

item.title: Structured 3D Latents for Scalable and Versatile 3D Generation
item.description: Unified 3D latent representation (SLAT) enables versatile high-quality 3D asset generation, significantly outperforming existing methods.

item.title: X-Prompt: Towards Universal In-Context Image Generation in Auto-Regressive Vision Language Foundation Models
item.description: X-Prompt: a novel autoregressive vision-language model achieves universal in-context image generation by efficiently compressing contextual information and using a unified training framework for super…

item.title: AlphaTablets: A Generic Plane Representation for 3D Planar Reconstruction from Monocular Videos
item.description: AlphaTablets: A novel 3D plane representation enabling accurate, consistent, and flexible 3D planar reconstruction from monocular videos, achieving state-of-the-art results.

item.title: Beyond Examples: High-level Automated Reasoning Paradigm in In-Context Learning via MCTS
item.description: HiAR-ICL, a novel automated reasoning paradigm using Monte Carlo Tree Search, surpasses state-of-the-art accuracy in complex mathematical reasoning by shifting focus from specific examples to abstract…

item.title: TAPTRv3: Spatial and Temporal Context Foster Robust Tracking of Any Point in Long Video
item.description: TAPTRv3 achieves state-of-the-art long-video point tracking by cleverly using spatial and temporal context to enhance feature querying, surpassing previous methods and demonstrating strong performance…

item.title: Training and Evaluating Language Models with Template-based Data Generation
item.description: Researchers created TemplateGSM, a massive dataset of 7M+ grade-school math problems and solutions, using GPT-4 to generate templates, significantly advancing LLM training for mathematical reasoning.

item.title: Patience Is The Key to Large Language Model Reasoning
item.description: Boosting Large Language Model (LLM) reasoning without massive datasets: A novel training method encourages ‘patient’ reasoning, improving accuracy by up to 6.7% on benchmark tasks.

item.title: SageAttention2 Technical Report: Accurate 4 Bit Attention for Plug-and-play Inference Acceleration
item.description: SageAttention2 achieves 4-bit accurate attention, boosting inference speed by 2x compared to FlashAttention2, while maintaining end-to-end accuracy across diverse models.

item.title: AnimateAnything: Consistent and Controllable Animation for Video Generation
item.description: AnimateAnything: A unified approach enabling precise & consistent video manipulation via a novel optical flow representation and frequency stabilization.

item.title: Enhancing the Reasoning Ability of Multimodal Large Language Models via Mixed Preference Optimization
item.description: Boosting multimodal reasoning in LLMs, researchers developed Mixed Preference Optimization (MPO) and a large-scale dataset (MMPR), significantly improving reasoning accuracy and achieving performance …

item.title: LLaMA-Mesh: Unifying 3D Mesh Generation with Language Models
item.description: LLaMA-Mesh: Unifying 3D mesh generation with LLMs by directly representing meshes as text, enabling efficient text-to-3D conversion within a single model.

item.title: Sharingan: Extract User Action Sequence from Desktop Recordings
item.description: Sharingan extracts user action sequences from desktop recordings using novel VLM-based methods, achieving 70-80% accuracy and enabling RPA.

item.title: JanusFlow: Harmonizing Autoregression and Rectified Flow for Unified Multimodal Understanding and Generation
item.description: JanusFlow harmonizes autoregression and rectified flow for unified multimodal understanding and generation, achieving state-of-the-art results on standard benchmarks.

item.title: DimensionX: Create Any 3D and 4D Scenes from a Single Image with Controllable Video Diffusion
item.description: DimensionX generates photorealistic 3D and 4D scenes from a single image via controllable video diffusion, enabling precise manipulation of spatial structure and temporal dynamics.

item.title: DeeR-VLA: Dynamic Inference of Multimodal Large Language Models for Efficient Robot Execution
item.description: DeeR-VLA dynamically adjusts the size of a multimodal large language model based on task difficulty, significantly reducing computational cost and memory usage in robotic control without compromising …

item.title: Sparsing Law: Towards Large Language Models with Greater Activation Sparsity
item.description: Researchers discovered predictable scaling laws for activation sparsity in LLMs, showing how data, architecture, and model size influence sparsity, paving the way for more efficient and interpretable …

item.title: WebRL: Training LLM Web Agents via Self-Evolving Online Curriculum Reinforcement Learning
item.description: WEBRL: A self-evolving online curriculum reinforcement learning framework empowers open LLMs to excel as high-performing web agents, surpassing proprietary models.

item.title: AndroidLab: Training and Systematic Benchmarking of Android Autonomous Agents
item.description: ANDROIDLAB, a novel framework, systematically benchmarks Android autonomous agents, improving LLM and LMM success rates on 138 tasks via a unified environment and open-source dataset.

item.title: Constraint Back-translation Improves Complex Instruction Following of Large Language Models
item.description: Constraint Back-translation enhances complex instruction following in LLMs by leveraging inherent constraints in existing datasets for efficient high-quality data creation.
